content.text: Match ends, Everton 3, Stoke City 4.
Second Half ends, Everton 3, Stoke City 4.
Brendan Galloway (Everton) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Joselu (Stoke City).
Goal!  Everton 3, Stoke City 4. Marko Arnautovic (Stoke City) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the high centre of the goal.
John Stones (Everton) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Penalty Stoke City. Marko Arnautovic draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by John Stones (Everton) after a foul in the penalty area.
Attempt missed. Seamus Coleman (Everton) left footed shot from the right side of the box is too high.
Foul by Marco van Ginkel (Stoke City).
John Stones (Everton) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Offside, Stoke City. Ibrahim Afellay tries a through ball, but Ryan Shawcross is caught offside.
Marco van Ginkel (Stoke City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by John Stones (Everton).
Substitution, Stoke City. Marco van Ginkel replaces Xherdan Shaqiri.
Offside, Stoke City. Ibrahim Afellay tries a through ball, but Jonathan Walters is caught offside.
Offside, Everton. Ross Barkley tries a through ball, but Seamus Coleman is caught offside.
Hand ball by Joselu (Stoke City).
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Philipp Wollscheid.
Goal!  Everton 3, Stoke City 3. Joselu (Stoke City) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the high centre of the goal.
Marko Arnautovic (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Arouna Koné (Everton).
Substitution, Stoke City. Jonathan Walters replaces Geoff Cameron.
Attempt missed. Gerard Deulofeu (Everton) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left.
Goal!  Everton 3, Stoke City 2. Gerard Deulofeu (Everton) right footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Ross Barkley.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Brendan Galloway (Everton) because of an injury.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Ryan Shawcross.
Attempt blocked. Steven Naismith (Everton) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Romelu Lukaku.
Seamus Coleman (Everton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Marko Arnautovic (Stoke City).
Offside, Stoke City. Marko Arnautovic tries a through ball, but Joselu is caught offside.
Substitution, Everton. Steven Naismith replaces Tom Cleverley.
Goal!  Everton 2, Stoke City 2. Romelu Lukaku (Everton) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Tom Cleverley with a through ball.
Substitution, Stoke City. Joselu replaces Bojan.
Attempt missed. Arouna Koné (Everton) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Tom Cleverley.
Attempt blocked. Ross Barkley (Everton) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Gerard Deulofeu.
Attempt saved. Geoff Cameron (Stoke City) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Erik Pieters.
Gerard Deulofeu (Everton) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Marko Arnautovic (Stoke City).
Tim Howard (Everton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Marko Arnautovic (Stoke City).
Corner,  Stoke City. Conceded by Ramiro Funes Mori.
Brendan Galloway (Everton) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Xherdan Shaqiri (Stoke City).
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Glen Johnson.
Attempt blocked. Tom Cleverley (Everton) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Romelu Lukaku.
Foul by Gareth Barry (Everton).
Ibrahim Afellay (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Second Half begins Everton 1, Stoke City 2.
First Half ends, Everton 1, Stoke City 2.
Bojan (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Seamus Coleman (Everton).
Goal!  Everton 1, Stoke City 2. Xherdan Shaqiri (Stoke City) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Bojan with a through ball.
Offside, Stoke City. Xherdan Shaqiri tries a through ball, but Marko Arnautovic is caught offside.

Gerard Deulofeu (Everton) has gone down, but that's a dive.
